lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: it helps make the world a better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach five and six year old Kindergarten students in a public school setting. It is a joy to come to work every day!

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I've had a lot of help the last few years from some great people who have helped me recover from the "big wind" destruction of four hurricanes.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the United States Government gathering information about the US economy.  I go to small, medium and large businesses in order to get this information.  I hear about their business struggles, plans, successes and failures in the course of my work.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: Someone loaned to me almost 10 years ago to start my business and I wanted to do that for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Sales Director in the field of cosmetics.  I sell cosmetics directly to customers and I also share the same opportunity with other women and help them to build their own cosmetics  business.

lenders.name: marcel
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my rich life and help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a school for business administration.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people advance in life.  Everyone should have the chance.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's important for everyone to help others when they can. The amount doesn't matter, what matters is everyone reaching out to the extent that they are able.
lenders.occupational_info: I managed retail stores for 20 years, currently I sell computer systems to retail stores.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because:
"Only through the act of giving can our feelings of powerlessness and separateness recede.  For it is through this act of giving that we are awakened to the interconnectedness that binds us all and then we realize that giving to others is also giving to ourselves.  And soon we too shall want for nothing."  –Eric A. DeCuir Jr.  2008

Quote I try to live by:
“A human being is part of the whole called by us universe , a part limited in time and space. We experience ourselves, our thoughts and feelings as something separate from the rest. A kind of optical delusion of consciousness. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us. Our task must be to free ourselves from the prison by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty... We shall require a substantially new manner of thinking if mankind is to survive." -Albert Einstein

lenders.name: Hubert
lenders.loan_because: I would like to change your life and also want you to be in a position to change the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Lead Program Manager that manages a team consisting of Project Managers and Analysts.

lenders.name: Steve & Laura
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help developing countries and entrepreneurs around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very high paced with a lot of hours. Restaurant businesses are known for having the worst hours. I manage a team of employees from kitchen staff to front staff.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky to work in a profession that I enjoy.  I became a math teacher many years ago and it is a pleasure to do what you want in your adult life.  I want others to understand that same sense of joy.
lenders.occupational_info: After being a teacher for 13 years I became a school administrator.  I have only worked at the high school level (14 - 18 year olds).  In some countries I would called the Head Master or Director.

lenders.name: Sofia
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected, we are all human, and we all want the same things: security, better life for our children, love, happiness, to live with dignity.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: it matters.

lenders.name: Dydric
lenders.loan_because: I want to give hope to people and help those who are aspiring for a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: making a difference through small everyday things

lenders.name: brandon
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back what the Almighty Lord has blessed my family with..
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves computer communications around the world

lenders.name: kyla and Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: Matthew 25:40 " Whenever you did one of these things to someone overlooked or ignored, that was me—you did it to me."

lenders.name: cathy
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to lend a hand to someone who can use one.

lenders.name: maureen
lenders.loan_because: this is a great idea and I'm happy to be a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a family farm, with the help of 1 son on the farm and 4 other children off the farm, but involved and owning animals. We milk 200 head of Brown Swiss, Holsteins, and Jerseys.

lenders.name: monica
lenders.loan_because: its fun.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in any way, no matter how incremental, to become more self-sufficient is a way to change the world.

lenders.name: FRANCINE
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle and never having friends to loan you money or to assist you.  Sometimes you get lucky or you just pray with conviction to the Lord and then he certainly makes a way for whatever you need. I wish to support others who are unfortunate to have the life style they seek .  We are all GOD's children and it is important to assist others as "his" instrument for the better in all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business woman who has  the passion to assist others.  I believe that is what my calling is and I want to do this as a gift to those who have had their struggles as I have.

lenders.name: Erick
lenders.occupational_info: PC Technical support

lenders.name: Don and Jim
lenders.loan_because: We have met many Mexican people since moving here.  They are lovely, honest and hard working people whom we will support in any way.
lenders.occupational_info: A retired broadcaster turned retailer now living in Mexico and a retired telecommunications rep.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I know that even my small donations make a big difference in the lives of others and I trust Kiva completly.  It is a great organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy things and re-sell them on Ebay and also make jewelry that I try to sell at fairs and stores.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because:
I love micro-lending! And I love Kiva! 

Recommended Reading:

Banker To The Poor: Micro-Lending and the Battle Against World Poverty
by Muhammad Yunus, Founder of the Grameen Bank, Winner of the Nobel Peace Prize

Creating a World Without Poverty: Social Business and the Future of Capitalism
by Muhammad Yunus

Give Us Credit by Alex Counts (1996)
Muhammad Yunus mentions this book in Banker to the Poor on page 188.
He says that it is the most fascinating storytelling he has ever read.

My Favorite Kiva Video - The LAPO Women of Nigeria:
LAPO Women Say Their Thank You's - http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=20 or see it at YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gn3G2wc9bUc.

lenders.name: Sindee
lenders.loan_because: I want to give something back especially to help women working hard to make a better life for their children.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired teacher and principal now volunteer teaching and helping older women.

lenders.name: Kristie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: Helping people feels good and I'm grateful to be able to help in this way.  I grew up in small businesses and I have my own small businesses.  If I can assist someone in establishing or improving theirs, I'm all for it!
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites and provide IT services to small business and residential clients.  I also produce e-learning modules for delivery over the web and am a world traveler.  I love my life!

lenders.name: Kaytlyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to support these heroes who learn, build and create to make their businesses thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work one-on-one to help women create confidence in their online personas and websites that connect thoughtfully and emotionally. I understand the passion and perseverance of small business owners and admire the way women are shifting business and behavior. My wish is for every woman to feel safe and important in their community.

lenders.name: Michele Allen
lenders.loan_because: Owning my own business added to my happiness and security enormously. I want to help other people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I setup computers and teach small business owners how to use them.

lenders.name: greg
lenders.loan_because: We all need a little now and then, for very little dollars I can help make a big difference in someone life. Especially in the life of a entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: Help families save for retirement

lenders.name: Clifford
lenders.loan_because:
'Credit is a Human Right'
           Muhammad Yunus
lenders.occupational_info: Producer of grains -- canola, wheat, barley, oats

lenders.name: Duane
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be in the position I am. I lend because it makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: What seems like a small amount to me can make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: SUSAN
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who have very little and are working hard to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Very satisfying & helps me understand how essential it is to have the funds when a business needs to be started.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and to make a positive difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I started my own pet sitting service where I care for other people's pets while they're working or on vacation.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: people deserve a chance in providing a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are willing to help themselves.  Kiva makes regifting a good thing...
lenders.occupational_info: I provide technical support to cable television operators.  I work for a cable equipment distributor that supplies everything from nuts and bolts to digital headend solutions.  I am a member of Christians in Communications, and a member of Community of Christ Church.  Come join me in makeing a difference.     Let me send you an Invite.  Email me at ramos@adamsglobal.com

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: God has given me the gift of giving. "I am because we are; because we are, therefore I am."
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand and respect each other in the workplace.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I do accounting for one of the large movie studios.

lenders.name: Anne Obradovich
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of the change I want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying so that I might also build my own business, perhaps Kiva may help me one day to do so.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I loan funds to those in need, because at one time I was a person in need.  Now that I am able to pay it forward I do so as much as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students who are disabled by using visual arts to enable them to explore themselves and the wonderful world around them.

lenders.name: Isabel
lenders.loan_because: there but for the grace of God go I
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I was in poverty rasing 2 children alone and someone extended their hand to help me. I am just passing it forward. Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on Air Force Jets.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: God gave me a gift when I was born. That gift was to Love Everyone on this Earth no matter what, religion, race, creed, color. I have been giving to strangers, family, friends all my life. I will give until the day God calls me home to rest. I love you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at two hospital's in Ilinois, doing patient registration, giving them the best service each and every day, with a beautiful smile and a great personality. I love helping people.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: it's a small flutter of a butterfly wing.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the World.
lenders.occupational_info: Part owner of a Century 21 office.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.occupational_info: I am contracted out by our department of fisheries or industry to take marine fisheries stock assessment or complete marine habitat environmental assessments.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: Everyone who is willing to work for their dreams deserves support to achieve it as I have done myself. I'm very excited to have this opportunity to assist others in their success for their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for city government and am assigned to lower income neighborhoods where I can help improve the lives of people by improving the neighborhoods that they live in. I work to bring new industrial companies, commerical businesses, and the development of new housing to a community that has not seen new development in many years.  I also assist in the development of new schools and parks for the residents.

lenders.name: CANDI
lenders.loan_because: I admire anyone who takes the initiative to make their life better by working hard and needs some help to accomplish their goal.

lenders.name: Yasmina
lenders.loan_because:
It is just beautiful to see how easy it is to make this world a better place  with little love and little money every bit counts.  

Also, I remember my grandparents telling us similar stories about having to borrow money or trade certain services to survive during World War II.

We are blessed so lets share the wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: Administrator

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I once worked as a volunteer in Kenya: Nairobi, Kisumu and Ugunja

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.occupation: Flint River Ranch Pet Food Distributor
lenders.loan_because:
I know that Father God wants us all to help each other!
What a Blessing this is for everyone involved!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell Safe Dog & Cat food. We have had many recalls on pet food here in America.  And many pets have died due to unsafe food.

lenders.name: Charity
lenders.loan_because: I want this world to be a better place, and I think this is one way to help that happen.  I believe that, as a civilization, we now have the resources and technology to bring everyone on earth out of extreme poverty.  Not to do so would be unethical and short-sighted in terms of global safety.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on projects to prevent, cleanup or contain pollution to help protect people and the environment.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have people believe in me when I needed it.  I have also seen first hand what a difference such loans can make to people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Assisting small scale dairy farmers transition into value added production and bring their products into the marketplace.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I love empowering people to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: service & hospitality industry

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others fulfill their dreams while providing an income for themselves and their families. And it just plain feels good! :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I turned a passion into a business - selling collector grade crystal and mineral specimens. Yes, I sell rocks! :-)

lenders.name: Puy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Marion Eichler
lenders.loan_because: It seems to be a great way to help hardworking people, who do not have access to the same financial resources as we do. Hopefully this small effort on my part will make a difference in their lives !!!

lenders.name: Shawn & Lance
lenders.loan_because: We feel lucky and fortunate to be able to loan and to be in the company of such giving souls. Thank You Kiva and to everyone who makes this happen.

lenders.name: Michael Kocher
lenders.loan_because: Right now circumstances and choices leave me unable to travel internationally and help people directly. In fact, because of my line of work, my interaction is most likely to be decidedly unpeaceful. I want to try and do what I can to help, above and beyond what else is possible from home.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a United States Marine and serve my country as much as I can. I'm also a University student pursuing a degree in Politics, with an intention to someday go into political consulting, policy analysis and international governmental consulting, hopefully building enough influence to stop the sorts of conflicts I currently work in.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I believe God wants His people to love and care for one another.   It's exciting to imagine how these businesses will flourish.

lenders.name: Alain Wong
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Technical Support Engineer in the Silicon Valley (California). My job is to help customers resolve technical issues with their internet equipment.

lenders.name: Adri
lenders.loan_because: I love to see others plant/grow and flourish their dreams.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others; especially single women supporting children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker.  I help people buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: Some one has helped me in my endevors.
lenders.occupational_info: Performing Arts Stuido                               Also Globalinx .net

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: It's right to "pay it forward"

lenders.name: cfree
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a hand up and not just a hand out..

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the model of microfinance as a means to lift people out of poverty.

lenders.name: Ivan
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to be making a difference.

lenders.name: Long
lenders.loan_because: It make me happy when I can help some one in need a helping hand.

lenders.name: Mike & Olga
lenders.loan_because: I can and that I believe in lending the rod and bait over a giving a basket of fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and code business web applications.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my blessings and honour the memory of those who would be doing wonderful things themselves if they were still with us.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: We here in the United States are so fortunate to have what we have.  I think we should all give back to others in need around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: You have to love numbers........

lenders.name: Miguel
lenders.loan_because: I understand how important is to give back part of what life has gifted Us with.
lenders.occupational_info:
I own a Computer and Business Consulting Company for Minority Micro Eentrepreneurs ( www.americapsi.com ; www.vikamall.com). I am also a Licensed Real Estate Salesperson-ABR and Loan Officer.
I worked 17 years at PETROPERU as a maintenance supervisor and Planner/Coordinator for an oil field and Natural Gas Plants.

lenders.name: Sajad
lenders.loan_because: would love to help someone....

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to give and support other entrepreneurs. I love how Kiva is set up where a little bit of money goes a long way.

lenders.name: Radito M. Anoran
lenders.loan_because: Today we all countries are affected by global crisis, so I want to have a small business of my own to support my family and other relative.
lenders.occupational_info: low income.

lenders.name: Baffour
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I made this loan because Obuasi is where I was born and raised. I know the market. I could't believe that this lady from my town was on Kiva trying to expand her business. I did not hesitate to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the phone company, Verizon in corporate benefits.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed. I saw much poverty living in Mexico and we truly have no idea what it is to "go without " in our society.

lenders.name: Sunderta Kaur
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner who has been blessed with great success. I find it so exciting to be able to support other entrepeneurs like myself. Spiritually I believe in tithing to others who are demonstrating that which I want to manifest more of in my own life. What a great opportunity Kiva presents for me to be able to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Drug and Alcohol Counselor, a Kundalini Yoga Teacher and a healer.

lenders.name: Ugen Peden
lenders.loan_because: I care....
lenders.occupational_info: Insurance, college,Retirement planning Boutique practice....

lenders.name: Corinna
lenders.loan_because: Circulating kindness and giving in the hopes that we can all be more equal someday. To truly know this gift can really make a difference in someone's life and their family.

lenders.name: Rosli
lenders.loan_because: I want to see world without poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work hard and receive payment monthly.

lenders.name: MARIA
lenders.loan_because: Thru Kiva, I help others to fulfill their dreams and others to survive

lenders.name: Lori & Allison
lenders.loan_because: It will make a difference in the lives of those who receive the loans.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Easy and fun way to make a difference without paying for huge management fees to the usual "charities"
lenders.occupational_info: I drive a big Semi full of mail around St.Paul Minnesota. I have been driving big trucks for 42 years. Fun job and great to be outdoors.

lenders.name: Marguerite
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is the best idea/way to enable the third world to improve their lot and create autonomy.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because:
Because I believe that the greatest gift you can give is to help someone be able to support themselves and their family. THIS IS A AMAZING PROGRAM!!!! I am so glad that I found this site on Thanksgiving Day 2007. Thank you Oprah again for helping to spread the word...and to the Founders of Kiva for their passion to create such a powerful "Giving & Receiving Tool" to the world...May God Bless You. 
Sheri Sharman
lenders.occupational_info: I am a proffessional Network Marketer that loves teaching people how to become successful in all areas of their lives. I have spent the past 20 years traveling around the world and doing seminars teaching simple ways to truly be "Living & Loving Life!!!"

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky to get help from my family, and want to "be there" for someone else.  Sharing helps the world go around.
lenders.occupational_info: I rent housing to people.  I like to sew, and create new things.  I believe farmers are the beginning of a healthy economy.  I am also an independent brand partner for Nerium International, an amasing anti-ageing compant who is totally dedicated to making people better!  Sort of like Kiva in an entrepenurial way!

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance....

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: It is important to me to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a US Army Nurse. I try never to forget how fortunate I am to wake up everyday with adequate amounts of: clean water, food, clothing, and shelter. Few in the world can boast such luxuries.

lenders.name: christina
lenders.loan_because: I Can.

lenders.name: Julie & Andy

lenders.name: Thomas

lenders.occupational_info: I help make computers.

lenders.name: carolyn

lenders.loan_because: I know little things make big changes in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student who is aspiring to go to law school. I work part-time. I am Assyrian, born in Chicago, IL USA and love being a student. lenders.name: ramon
lenders.loan_because: i love being a giver...
lenders.occupational_info: soldier

lenders.name: Lois
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and a small amount can help
lenders.occupational_info: I am a coordinator for research projects related to kidney and pancreas transplant. I see patients on a regular basis. I also record  pertinent data that eventually is analyzed.

lenders.name: Kim Mooney
lenders.loan_because: I have a connection to single parents and I want to do what I can to help other mothers and fathers achieve big things so they can provide for their children. We may not all have the same opportunities, but we all equally strive to do our best for our families.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I can tell the sincerity of the founders when I saw them at the Oprah show. The organization is so powerful in that it reaches the poorest people and allows average people like me to help in small ways.
lenders.occupational_info: I now managed my own business, a home health care office in Canton, OH. We provide caregivers to help the elderly with everyday living activities and provide companionship in their own homes.

lenders.loan_because: I feel it helps those who want to better their there situation and gives them a chance to take care of there families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Always cleaning something

anyone who is able should help those in need. I'm trying to make a difference in this world in the hope that those who see my good deeds will praise my Father in heaven.

matt. 5:16

lenders.loan_because: I want to help others change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help get environmental engineers get trained yearly.

lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and I want to share.

lenders.name: The Crosby Family
lenders.loan_because: i Believe that every single positive deed that each person makes to help the progression towards "World Peace" the dream will one day be relized.

lenders.name: Michael & Martha
lenders.loan_because: We think this is a unique opportunity to fulfill the obligation we all have to help others, especially those who have shown a desire to better themselves.

lenders.name: G.W.

lenders.occupational_info: ~I wish you all success and happiness.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for elders, to help them stay strong and independent; to help them with Plan B when independence is no longer possible.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people. I believe if they have the opportunity to succeed, the drive to accomplish, anything can be.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from work, but try to help and volunteer wherever I see a need.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I opened my  own business in March 2007.  Iwould not have been able to do this without assisstance from my father.  He gave me the opportunity to reach for a dream that I have had.  My business has been successful and now I want to help someone else have the opportunity to reach their dream.  It's time for me to "pay it forward"
lenders.occupational_info: I help others in my community to recover from physical problems or injuries.  My wife works for the county recreation department and heads Special Olympics in our area.  My 2 children attend grade school.

lenders.name: Rocky Coney Island
lenders.loan_because: It's one of the greatest gift in the world.  It is a great feeling to help others.

lenders.name: Diann
lenders.loan_because: When I have extra money available, the best place to put it to good use right away is on Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Being a Grandmother is excellent work.

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.loan_because: I've been very blessed in my life.  When I was at my lowest point someone reached out to me.  It's all about doing the same for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with women recovering from addiction.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I feel like God put me on this earth to help others it is up to us to help those in need
lenders.occupational_info: I have retired but still do a few things to keep me busy. I just started doing direct sales and am selling for TomBoy Tools. What a great product for women.

lenders.name: Kellee & Ron
lenders.loan_because: we like the idea of helping working people continue to be independent and the Kiva cycle of once the money is repaid, loaning it to another working individual.

lenders.name: Suzanne & Randal
lenders.loan_because: money is only useful if it's circulating.

To complain about almost ANYTHING in the US, is to not appreciate how hard the rest of the world has it.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: At one time I was a single mother raising four children.  Although we had everything we needed, it was a constant struggle to make ends meet.  There were times when someone would unexpectedly help me and it brought such a feeling of hope and relief.  I would like to give that feeling to someone else!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Manpower Inc. providing staffing  and permanent placement services to businesses in the southeastern Indiana area.

lenders.name: Lisa Ann
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I actually am a business analyst but I love to knit in my spare time.  I found this site through Oprah.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have been born in a politically stable and economically strong part of the world.  Lending through Kiva reminds me that not all of God's children are so fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the labor and material inputs necessary to build electronic assemblies for my company's customers.

lenders.name: Janice & Clark
lenders.loan_because: Paying it forward.

lenders.name: Meagan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometimes, and I am so fortunate in my own life.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on all sorts of products and services - from chocolate to beauty products and everything in between.

lenders.name: Briana
lenders.loan_because:
Preach the gospel at all times; If necessary, use words 

-st. francis of assisi
lenders.occupational_info: I am full-time college student & I take care of children in my home while their mothers are at work.

lenders.name: Robert Easter
lenders.loan_because: I saw an article of TV about Kiva and decided I had to be a part of this amazing movement to invest in the future of those who need it most.  To be able to help someone help themselves is much more worth while to me.

lenders.name: marty
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make a better living to be able to provide for their families.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I recycle electronics in an environmentally friendly manner in San Diego, California, USA.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Its the right way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise horses and alfalfa and grass hay.

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Yumi
lenders.loan_because: I have the capability and the funds to improve someone else's life --in both a constructive and responsible way.  Kiva makes it easy to give the impoverished an opportunity to better provide for their family.  And I am happy to loan.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to give back and make a difference

lenders.name: Kim and Jerry
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help others.

lenders.name: Natasha
lenders.loan_because: i love it! what a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: massage therapist

lenders.name: Lazette
lenders.loan_because: I believe God blesses me to be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the care and support of children
